channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: McDonald’s sees lower foot traffic as revenue misses Wall Street expectations
item.description: Fast-food giant says consumers continue to grapple with economic uncertainty.

item.title: Medical-products maker Becton Dickinson says cuts in global research funding have hurt sales
item.description: “It’s become clear that pressure on research spending increased in the second quarter and will likely persist through fiscal year 2025,” the company s...

item.title: Astronomer’s $93M raise underscores a new reality: Orchestration is king in AI infrastructure
item.description: Astronomer secures $93 million in Series D funding to solve the AI implementation gap through data orchestration, helping enterprises streamline compl...

item.title: Your guide to Day 2 of the 2025 Robotics Summit & Expo

item.title: Salesforce takes aim at ‘jagged intelligence’ in push for more reliable AI

item.title: Bulls beware: A volatile stock market like this one is dangerous and can easily turn
item.description: What began as an oversold rally in early April is now generating some buy signals, but that doesn’t mean all is bullish again.

item.title: Microsoft launches Phi-4-Reasoning-Plus, a small, powerful, open weights reasoning model!
item.description: The release demonstrates that with carefully curated data and training techniques, small models can deliver strong reasoning performance.

item.title: ‘Retirement is within my grasp’: I’m 57, my 401(k) is dropping and I’m feeling anxious about a recession. What can I do?
item.description: “I feel like I’m fiddling while Wall Street burns.”

item.title: ‘We are the most privileged’: My husband and I are tired of paying for our friends. How do we get them to pay their way?
item.description: “My husband almost always ends up paying for everyone or picks up the entire bill.”

item.title: The ‘era of experience’ will unleash self-learning AI agents across the web—here’s how to prepare
item.description: AI visionaries predict an 'Era of Experience' where AI learns autonomously, and it will have important implications for application design.

item.title: UiPath’s new orchestrator guides AI agents to follow your enterprise’s rules
item.description: UiPath's agent orchestration layer Maestro moves prompts through three layers: the agent, a human and the robotic process automation system.
